allow: Bash(npx tsx -e "import { PrismaClient } from ''@prisma/client''; const prisma = new PrismaClient(); prisma.audit.findFirst({ where: { url: { contains: ''livingspace'' } }, orderBy: { createdAt: ''desc'' } }).then(audit => { console.log(''Latest audit ID:'', audit.id); console.log(''Created:'', audit.createdAt); console.log(''Status:'', audit.status); const results = audit.results as any; console.log(''Top-level keys:'', Object.keys(results)); console.log(''Has technical?'', !!results.technical); console.log(''Has performance?'', !!results.performance); console.log(''largeImages at root:'', results.largeImages); if (results.performance) { console.log(''performance.largeImages:'', results.performance.largeImages); console.log(''performance.largeImageDetails:'', results.performance.largeImageDetails?.length || 0); } prisma.$disconnect(); })")
